title: And Just Like That....Episode 7 Review - "Sex and the Widow"
itunes:title: And Just Like That....Episode 7 Review - "Sex and the Widow"
itunes:subtitle: 7 episodes in and Carrie FINALLY goes on a date
description:
On this week's review of And Just Like That, we continue our analysis of what's happened to our beloved characters. Was Steve ever right for Miranda Hobbes? Does Steve's storyline deserve justice? And what about Carrie's disastrous date? Would you give a guy another chance who projectile vomited on your first date with them?


Join us this week as we go down the rabbit hole on all things for the new episode of the Sex and the City reboot!



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
